channel.title: ~Help with adding full helms masks and such.~
channel.description: Alright, this is my problem, ive tired adding hoods masks party hats fullhelms etc, in the item.java theirs 3 of them so idk what to add them to, ive tired added these hat hood or w/e, to get one and tired, then all 3 and diffenert combintions but it still gos to wepon solt, so please help? i know this is simple. . .i should know but i rarley ad custom items. so if someone could help me id like it:)

item.title: ~Help with adding full helms masks and such.~
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

You’re welcome, good luck on developing your server.

Read full topic
item.source: ~Help with adding full helms masks and such.~

item.title: ~Help with adding full helms masks and such.~
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:4, topic:335027”]For hats, use static int hats
For masks, use static int masks.

Example

public static int mask[] { redhweenmaskID, bluehweenmaskID, greenhweenmaskID, highwaymanmaskID };

Lol thanks, that actully worked, for the hats one, ive never tired that befor. Cus it looked wired, and i spawned a item from it and it was a gs shard, but now i know thanks:)

Read full topic
item.source: ~Help with adding full helms masks and such.~

For hats, use static int hats
For masks, use static int masks.

item.title: ~Help with adding full helms masks and such.~
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:2, topic:335027”]public static int hats[] { hat, hat, hat, hat, hat }; public static int masks[] { mask, mask, mask, mask, mask }; public static int shield[] {shield, shield, shield, shield};

Find something in your source that is similar to that.[/quote]

It has that, but i have vaoirs ones something to do with helms, and idk what one to put it in, ive tired all though, you have team viewer?

Read full topic

item.title: ~Help with adding full helms masks and such.~
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

public static int hats[] { hat, hat, hat, hat, hat }; public static int masks[] { mask, mask, mask, mask, mask }; public static int shield[] {shield, shield, shield, shield};

Find something in your source that is similar to that.

Read full topic
